title: Designing an App,  software, or website that may deal with car insurance?
transcript:
[Questioner] from India I work for a software 
company my company has got a new project for a   for an automobile companies Insurance code 
uh they want me to develop a website which   will display the uh code for example if an 
accident happens uh depending on the nature   of the accident the affected person have 
any children and other practice the code   will be displayed my job here is to develop 
this website to show the code to the users   and uh my company is also forcing me to do 
this so is it permissible for me to do it   so let me get to this straight your company 
is not an insurance company but your job is   to develop an app where you can decide whose 
fault was it in a car accident is that true   uh also it will develop a code for example if 
the uh depending upon the accident if the also   the nature of the accident and or the affected 
person have any children or the court will be   generated for how much money the uh instance will 
be paid how how can you uh estimate the amount   of compensation to be given uh it depends on the 
automobile company they will give you they will be   giving the data depending on how they have it okay 
I will answer Insha'Allah I remember your question   David from India says that he's responsible for 
uh an app that decides who is at fault when car   accidents take place and what the compensation 
should be from the one who's wrong to the one   who is the victim I don't see any Haram in that 
because this is not mandated this is not something   enforced this is something usually either the 
government forces it and implements it and you   can not do anything about it or it is something 
that they both agree upon that such an app would   be the arbitrator between them and to set this 
so inshallah there's no problem in that is that and have you ever taken a counseling session with 
me go to my website and you will find counseling   sessions and apply for one if you can afford it 
that's good for you if you cannot you're entitled   for one free session and this is for everybody 
if they can affirm by Allah that they cannot   afford it because they're poor I'll give them 
one free session without a problem a full half   an hour so come to me and let's speak about 
it inshallah within the following two days   or three days I will uh try and seek Allah's 
guidance to solve the problem once and for All
